scripts.backend:setup: bash -lc 'cd backend && [ -d .venv ] || python3 -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt'
scripts.backend:run: bash -lc "cd backend && export DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=config.settings && .venv/bin/python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000"
